title: Ethereum Layer 2 Blast Has Crypto Users Split on Its Impact
description: Blast, a layer-2 blockchain that will go live in March, has garnered more than $225 million in staked assets since Monday, but many crypto investors remain skeptical.

title: KyberSwap hacker opens door for negotiations after $45 million exploit
description:
The KyberSwap hacker has shown a willingness to negotiate after exploiting the decentralized exchange for around $45 million, according to on-chain messages. The attacker publicly messaged KyberSwap, stating negotiations would commence shortly after adequate “rest:” “Dear Kyberswap Developers, Employees, DAO members, and LPs, Negotiations will start in a few hours when I am fully rested. […]

The post KyberSwap hacker opens door for negotiations after $45 million exploit appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BBVA Switzerland enhances digital asset operations with Ripple-owned Metaco
description: BBVA Switzerland, a branch of the renowned Spanish financial institution BBVA, has recently advanced its digital asset operations by partnering with Metaco, a company owned by Ripple. This collaboration is centered around the use of Metaco’s Harmonize platform, a move signaling BBVA’s increasing commitment to the growing sector of digital finance/  Expanding digital asset capabilities ... title: Former Valve developer reveals left 4 dead’s troubled development
description: Former Valve developer Chet Faliszek, known for his work on iconic titles like Portal, Half-Life 2, and Left 4 Dead, has shed light on the tumultuous development process of the renowned cooperative shooter, Left 4 Dead. title: Ethereum price prediction: is the bullish trend sustainable?
description: With Ethereum's price exceeding $2,000, the Blast network launch and BlackRock's ETF interest play key roles. Let’s analyze Ethereum (ETH) price predictions and market dynamics.

title: Singapore mulls new crypto rules, wants to ban retail traders from incentives and credit cards
description: The Monetary Authority of Singapore is seeking new limitations to harden crypto speculation. Singapore’s financial watchdog, the Monetary Authority of Singapore, is set to impose new rules on retail crypto investors in a bid to safeguard customers from highly speculative…
